meanings.definition: Covered with or full of froth
meanings.sent1: The cappuccino was the frothiest drink on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The ocean waves were frothiest during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The frothiest bubble bath made the kids giggle with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the frothiest foam, infectious and bubbly.
meanings.sent5: The frothiest milkshake was a creamy delight on a hot day.

meanings.sent1: The frothiest soap created bubbles that floated in the air.
meanings.sent2: The washing machine had the frothiest cycle for heavily soiled clothes.
meanings.sent3: The frothiest detergent made laundry day a bit more fun.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room was like the frothiest mixture, bubbling over.
meanings.sent5: The frothiest fountain in the park sprayed water high into the sky.

meanings.sent1: She was the frothiest fan at the concert, cheering loudly.
meanings.sent2: The dog became frothiest when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: His frothiest reaction to the surprise party was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The frothiest crowd at the game erupted in cheers.
meanings.sent5: Her excitement was the frothiest of them all, bubbling with joy.
